name: Purely B Sdn Bhd
description: Provider of an online content-based fitness and wellness portal designed to help women lead sustainable and healthy lifestyle. The company's fitness and wellness portal offers articles on living written by health and wellness experts, as well as a range of healthy and wholesome recipes created by a community of nutrition experts, enabling consumers to connect and share healthy living experiences and tips with other like-minded individuals, and purchase health and wellness products from an online platform.
one_liner: Provider of an online content-based fitness and wellness portal designed to help women lead sustainable and healthy lifestyle. The company's fitness and wellness portal offers articles on living written by health and wellness experts, as well as a range of healthy and wholesome recipes created by a community of nutrition experts, enabling consumers to connect and share healthy living experiences and tips with other like-minded individuals, and purchase health and wellness products from an online platform.
